                         throws java.io.IOException

      • option1

        public static void option1(java.lang.StringBuilder input,
                           ParallelQueue lines,
                           Theater[] movies)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Prompts for customer information (Name, partySize, movieName, underAge). After, it checks if the customer is in the either movie theater. Prompts repeatably until they enter a name that is not in the movie theater. If the customer was not found, then they will added to the appropriate line.
        Parameters:
        input - input string builder
        lines - ParallelQueue that represents lines
        movies - array of movies
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • option2

        public static void option2(java.lang.StringBuilder input,
                           ParallelQueue lines,
                           Theater[] movies)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieve the next customer from the lines and assign their seats if there are enough seats.
        Parameters:
        input - input string builder
        lines - ParallelQueue that represents lines
        movies - array of movies
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • option3

        public static void option3(java.lang.StringBuilder input,
                           Theater[] movies)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Prompts for a customer to leave Movie Theater.

        If the customer is found in either movie theaters, they will be removed from the seating chart.

        Parameters:
        input - input string builder
        movies - array of movies
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • option4

        Displays the customers in each line.
        Parameters:
